response.original_title: The Best in Adult Superstars 3: Savannah
response.overview: One of adults most famed and controversial stars, Savannah has forever left her mark on the business that made her famous. Few have ever fully embodied the phrase “Blonde Bombshell” like stunning, radiant beauty Savannah. The epitome of sex superstar, few adult stars have come close to approaching the level of cultural phenomenon that this troubled star achieved. Fans everywhere will be pleased with the release of this video chronicling this amazing performers adult career.
